languages.text:
Grants an additional attack and restores full MP.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Grants an additional attack and restores full MP.
Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
The wearer regains all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can make an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text:
Grants an additional attack and restores full MP.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer regains all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can make an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
使用者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を回復し、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ラウンド{/g}に追加で攻撃を行える。
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer regains all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can make an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
使用者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を回復し、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ラウンド{/g}に追加で攻撃を行える。
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。

languages.text:
Персонаж восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и может совершить дополнительную атаку в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
languages.original_text:
The wearer regains all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can make an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

Персонаж восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и может совершить дополнительную атаку в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zurück und kann in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einen weiteren Angriff ausführen.
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
The wearer regains all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can make an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} geri kazanır ve o {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} ilave bir saldırı yapabilir.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.

The wearer regains all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can make an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.

languages.text:
Le porteur récupère tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et peut effectuer une attaque supplémentaire lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
El portador recupera todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y puede realizar un ataque adicional en este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
! Solo puede usarse una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
装备者恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且可以在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中额外攻击一次。
！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
